fields.text: Welcome to Scion Staffing, your premier temporary and executive staffing partner in San Francisco.
If you are a job seeker looking for temporary or permanent positions, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a temporary staffing specialist.
For executive search and career placement, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to an executive search consultant.
If you are an employer seeking to hire contract staff or executive leadership, press '[INDEX]'.
For contract staffing and temporary workforce solutions, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our contract staffing team.
For executive recruitment and leadership search services, press '[INDEX]'.
